record.description: Co-eds go to school on skates. Miss Lucile Pfaender (left) and Miss Maryellen Falconer, co-eds at the University of Chicago, roll merrily down the Midway on their roller skates. Class-to-class monotony is broken up by this means of locomotion, and at the same time the exercise is extremely healthful. The fad, which the students have followed for several years, is a certain sign of spring.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
